maxCount.description: The maximum number of avatars shown

showMore.description: When maxCount is exceeded, whether to display a prompt to view more information
showMore.description_zh: 超出maxCount时是否显示查看更多的提示

keyName.description: Specifies which attribute is read from the object element of the array as the picture address
keyName.description_zh: 指定从数组的对象元素中读取哪个属性作为图片地址

gap.description: Occlusion ratio between avatars (0.4 means 40% occlusion)
gap.description_zh: 头像之间的遮挡比例（0.4代表遮挡40%）

extraValue.description: The value that needs to be displayed additionally, if set, takes precedence over the internal urls.length - maxCount value
extraValue.description_zh: 需额外显示的值，如设置则优先于内部的urls.length - maxCount值

events.name: showMore
events.description: More clicks on the avatar group
